title: US Stocks Slump as AI-Driven Selloff Spreads Across Market
description: A selloff in stocks of US companies that are under threat by artificial intelligence spread across sectors, including more insulated corners of the market like industrials, to send all market gauges lower.
content: A selloff in stocks of US companies that are under threat by artificial intelligence spread across sectors, including more insulated corners of the market like industrials, to send all market gauges lower.
